createAgent.description: Create a new CustomGPT agent by importing data from a sitemap or file

props.name: project_name
props.description: The name for your agent/project

props.name: sitemap_path
props.description: URL to a sitemap for importing agent knowledge (leave empty if uploading a file)

props.name: file
props.description: Upload a file (text, audio, or video format) for agent knowledge (leave empty if using sitemap)

createConversation.description: Create a new conversation in a CustomGPT project

props.name: name
props.description: Optional name for the conversation

export_conversation.description: Export a conversation with all messages, authors, feedbacks and metadata

props.name: session_id
props.description: The session ID of the conversation to export

props.name: name
props.description: Filter agents by name (optional)

findConversation.description: List and search conversations for an agent with optional filtering

props.name: name
props.description: Filter conversations by name (optional)

props.name: userFilter
props.description: Filter by user who created the conversation (default: all)

props.name: lastUpdatedAfter
props.description: Only return conversations with messages after this date (optional) e.g. 2025-01-09T18:30:00Z

sendMessage.description: Send a message to a conversation within an agent

props.name: session_id
props.description: The session ID of the conversation

props.name: prompt
props.description: The message/question to send

props.name: stream
props.description: Stream the response in real-time (default: false)

props.name: custom_persona
props.description: Custom persona/instructions for the agent (optional)

props.name: chatbot_model
props.description: AI model to use for the conversation (optional)

props.name: response_source
props.description: Source for generating responses (default: use only your content)

props.name: agent_capability
props.description: Capability mode for the agent (default: fastest-responses)

props.name: lang
props.description: Language code for the prompt (default: en)

props.name: custom_context
props.description: Additional context for the conversation (optional)

props.name: file
props.description: File to upload with the message (Max 5MB: pdf, docx, doc, odt, txt, jpg, jpeg, png, webp)

update_agent.description: Update an existing agent with specific details

props.name: project_name
props.description: The name of the agent

props.name: is_shared
props.description: Whether the agent is public or not

props.name: sitemap_path
props.description: URL of the sitemap to crawl

props.name: file_data_retension
props.description: Enable file data retention

props.name: is_ocr_enabled
props.description: Enable Optical Character Recognition for images

props.name: is_anonymized
props.description: Enable anonymization of data

props.name: file
props.description: Upload a file to the agent

props.name: are_licenses_allowed
props.description: Whether project licenses are allowed

update_settings.description: Update agent configuration and behavior settings

props.name: default_prompt
props.description: Default prompt text shown to users (e.g., "Ask Me Anything ...")

props.name: response_source
props.description: Source for generating responses

props.name: chat_bot_avatar
props.description: Upload avatar image for the chatbot

props.name: chat_bot_bg
props.description: Upload background image for the chatbot

props.name: chatbot_msg_lang
props.description: Language code for chatbot messages (e.g., "en", "es", "ur")

props.name: chatbot_color
props.description: Primary color for chatbot UI (hex color code, e.g., "#0e57cc")

props.name: chatbot_toolbar_color
props.description: Toolbar color for chatbot UI (hex color code)

props.name: persona_instructions
props.description: Custom persona/behavior instructions for the chatbot

props.name: citations_answer_source_label_msg
props.description: Label message for citation answer sources

props.name: citations_sources_label_msg
props.description: Label message for citation sources

props.name: hang_in_there_msg
props.description: Message shown during long processing times

props.name: chatbot_siesta_msg
props.description: Message shown when chatbot is temporarily unavailable

props.name: is_loading_indicator_enabled
props.description: Show loading indicator during responses

props.name: enable_citations
props.description: Enable citation display in responses

props.name: enable_feedbacks
props.description: Enable user feedback collection

props.name: citations_view_type
props.description: How citations should be displayed

props.name: no_answer_message
props.description: Message shown when no answer is found

props.name: ending_message
props.description: Message shown at the end of conversations

props.name: remove_branding
props.description: Remove CustomGPT branding from the chatbot

props.name: enable_recaptcha_for_public_chatbots
props.description: Enable reCAPTCHA for public chatbots

props.name: chatbot_model
props.description: Default AI model for the chatbot

props.name: is_selling_enabled
props.description: Enable selling features
